review: Cuts out every once in a while and will drop the tab I'm casting.  Also my devices won't always recognize it even when it's plugged in and going just fine.  These events are few and far between though, and overall it is a great buy for anybody, especially if they want to stream something from their computer over to their TV.  I don't know about you guys but watching a movie or sporting event on my computer just doesn't do it justice, and this $30 gizmo more than pays for itself after the first few events I've watch with it.

review: The is beautiful little piece of equipment that works using the wifi signal from you router with no effort on your part.Download the software from Play Store, install it by plugging it into the HDMI on the intended receiving device.Example:  The installed software on your tablet will send the signal to this device, and soon whatever you have on your tablet/phone/lap top will also be on your TV screen.  The instruction are a bit light weight, but after a few tries you will get it.
